title: DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit with 2 Batteries and Charger, Yellow/Black (DCK240C2)
descriptions:
Product Name: DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit with 2 Batteries and Charger, Yellow/Black (DCK240C2)

Introducing the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit, the ultimate power tool duo for a wide range of applications. This kit includes a DCD771 cordless drill/driver and a DCF885 cordless impact driver, both designed with compact and lightweight ergonomics for ultimate comfort and control.

The DCD771 cordless drill/driver features a high-performance motor delivering 300 UWO of power output. It comes with a 1/2-inch single sleeve ratcheting chuck and an ergonomic handle for easy operation. With its two-speed transmission, you can choose between 0-450 RPM or 0-1500 RPM to suit your task's requirements.

The DCF885 cordless impact driver is just as impressive, with its compact size of 5.55-inch front to back and a weight of only 2.8 lbs. It features a 1/4-inch hex chuck for one-handed bit loading and accepts 1-inch bit tips. The built-in LED light ring with three LEDs provides superior visibility, with a 20-second delay for added convenience.

This combo kit comes with two 20V MAX Lithium-Ion batteries and a charger, ensuring you always have the power you need to get the job done. The tools also feature LED foot lights for superior visibility in dark workspaces. The yellow/black design is not only stylish but also easy to spot in your toolbox or on your worksite.

Included in the package:
- 1x DCD771 20V max 1/2-inch Drill/Driver
- 1x DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver
- 2x 20V Lithium-Ion Batteries
- 1x Charger

Experience the power and convenience of the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit and elevate your tool collection today.
